as.description: The element or component this component should render as. Can be overwrite by asChild
as.description_zh: 此组件应呈现为的元素或组件。可以被 asChild 覆盖

asChild.description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.
asChild.description_zh: 更改作为子元素传递的默认渲染元素，合并其道具和行为。

defaultChecked.description: The checked state of the checkbox when it is initially rendered. Use when you do not need to control its checked state.
defaultChecked.description_zh: 最初呈现复选框时复选框的选中状态。在不需要控制其选中状态时使用。

:v-model:checked.description: The controlled checked state of the checkbox Must be binded with v-model.
:v-model:checked.description_zh: 复选框的受控选中状态必须与 v-model 绑定。

disabled.description: When true, prevents the user from interacting with the checkbox
disabled.description_zh: 如果为 true，则阻止用户与复选框交互

required.description: When true, indicates that the user must check the checkbox before the owning form can be submitted.
required.description_zh: 如果为 true，则指示用户必须先选中该复选框，然后才能提交所属表单。

name.description: The name of the checkbox Submitted with its owning form as part of a name/value pair.
name.description_zh: 复选框的名称 Submitted with its own-form as a name/value pair。

value.description: The value given as data when submitted with a name.
value.description_zh: 使用名称提交时作为数据给出的值。
